typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STGActivities
source(output(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean,
		regardinglead as integer,
		regardingopportunity as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWHActivities
source(output(
		SK_systemuserid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_systemuserid as string,
		fullname as string,
		parentsystemuserid as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SystemUsers
source(output(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		BK_leadid as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		custom_territorioid as string,
		custom_productid as string,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		HASHKEY as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Lead
source(output(
		SK_opportunityid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_opportunityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		parentaccountid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		closeprobability as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp,
		purchasetimeframe as integer,
		opportunityratingcode as integer,
		status as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Opportunity
STGActivities derive(HASHSTG = crc32(512,upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(status),toString(duedate),toString(priority),toString(duration),toString(modifiedon),toString(activitytype))) ~> HASHSTG
HASHSTG, DWHActivities lookup(STGActivities@SK_activityid == DWHActivities@SK_activityid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWHActivities@HASHKEY),
	HASHSTG!=DWHActivities@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1, SystemUsers join(ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@ownerid == BK_systemuserid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join3 derive(STGOwner = BK_systemuserid,
		STGLead = BK_leadid,
		STGOpportunity = BK_opportunityid) ~> DerivedColumn1
Join1, Lead join(regardingid == BK_leadid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2, Opportunity join(regardingid == BK_opportunityid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean,
		regardinglead as integer,
		regardingopportunity as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Actualiza
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_activityid as integer,
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		ownerid as integer,
		duration as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp,
		direction as boolean,
		regardinglead as integer,
		regardingopportunity as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_activityid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@SK_activityid,
		activitytype = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@activitytype,
		HASHKEY = HASHSTG,
		ownerid = STGOwner,
		duration = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@duration,
		modifiedon = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		priority = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@priority,
		status = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@status,
		duedate = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@duedate,
		direction = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@direction,
		regardinglead = STGLead,
		regardingopportunity = STGOpportunity
	)) ~> sink1
